00034 
00035 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00036 {
00037 
00038 class CDFProbeInformation;
00039 
00040 /*! Class that exposes the CDF probe group information */
00041 class CDFProbeGroupInformation
00042 {
00043 public:
00044         /*! Constructor */
00045         CDFProbeGroupInformation();
00046         /*! Desctructor */
00047         ~CDFProbeGroupInformation();
00048 
00049         /*! Get the probe set direction */
00050         DirectionType GetDirection() const { return (DirectionType)direction; }
00051         /*! Get the number of lists (atoms) in the probe group */
00052         u_int32_t GetNumLists() const { return listCnt; }
00053         /*! Get the number of cells in the probe group */
00054         u_int32_t GetNumCells() const { return cellCnt; }
00055         /*! Get the number of cells per list (atom) */
00056         u_int8_t GetNumCellsPerList() const { return (u_int8_t)cellsPerList; }
00057         /*! Get the probe group name = DataPlane name */
00058         std::wstring GetName() const { if (dataSet) return dataSet->Header().GetName(); else return L""; }
00059         /*! Get the wobble situation */
00060         u_int16_t GetWobbleSituation() const { return wobbleSituation; }
00061         /*! Get the allele */
00062         u_int16_t GetAlleleCode() const { return alleleCode; }
00063         /*! Get the channel */
00064         u_int8_t GetChannel() const { return channel; }
00065         /*! Get the probe replication type */
00066         ReplicationType GetRepType() const { return (ReplicationType)repType; }
00067         /*! Get information for the probe by index */
00068         void GetCell(int32_t cell_index, CDFProbeInformation& info);
00069 
00070 protected:
00071         void SetDataSet(DataSet* ds);
00072 
00073 protected:
00074         /*! DataSet pointer */
00075         DataSet* dataSet;
00076 
00077         /*! Probe set type - u_int8_t*/
00078         CDFDataTypeIds type;
00079         /*! Direction */
00080         u_int8_t direction;
00081         /*! Number of lists (atoms) in the probe group */
00082         u_int32_t listCnt;
00083         /*! Number of cells in the probe group */
00084         u_int32_t cellCnt;
00085         /*! Wobble situation */
00086         u_int16_t wobbleSituation;
00087         /*! Allele */
00088         u_int16_t alleleCode;
00089         /*! Channel */
00090         u_int8_t channel;
00091         /*! Probe replication type */
00092         u_int8_t repType;
00093         /*! Probe set number - same as ProbeSetNumber in C++ */
00094         u_int32_t probeSetNumber;
00095         /*! Cells per list (atom) - same as NumCellsPerList in C++ */
00096         u_int8_t cellsPerList;
00097 
00098         friend class CDFProbeSetInformation;
00099 };
00100 
00101 }
